entries.title: FAA proposes Feb. 2024 deadline for airplane altimeters to filter out 5G signals
entries.description: About 1,000 planes have altimeters listening to signals in the wrong frequencies.

entries.title: Microsoft’s new AI can simulate anyone’s voice with 3 seconds of audio
entries.description: Text-to-speech model can preserve speaker's emotional tone and acoustic environment.

entries.title: US acceptance of COVID vaccines rises, now like other Western democracies
entries.description: Despite the controversy, the US's vaccine acceptance looks very European.

entries.title: The Fairphone 2 will hit end-of-life after 7 years of updates
entries.description: Qualcomm ended support for phone's SoC in 2016, but Fairphone has kept on trucking.

entries.title: Schools sue social networks, claim they “exploit neurophysiology” of kids’ brains
entries.description: Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok, and YouTube sued by Seattle Public Schools.

entries.title: BMW is recalling 14,000 EVs to update the battery software
entries.description: A battery-monitoring bug could result in a vehicle losing power or not charging.

entries.title: Report: Mixed-reality headset will draw most of Apple’s focus in 2023
entries.description: 15-inch MacBook Air and a Mac Pro with non-upgradeable RAM also on the horizon.

entries.title: Raspberry Pi upgrades its Camera Module with HDR, autofocus, and more
entries.description: There's also a new lens-mounting attachment available for truly big photos.

entries.title: The US needs 8x more EV chargers by 2030, according to new report
entries.description: We'll need 2.13 million level 2 and 172,000 level 3 chargers by 2030, S&P says.

entries.title: John Deere relents, says farmers can fix their own tractors after all
entries.description: After a lengthy argument, a right to repair comes to agricultural machinery.

entries.title: Virgin Orbit says it is ready to make history in the United Kingdom tonight
entries.description: "The public cannot wait for the UK to come and join that exclusive launch club."

entries.title: The 7 most interesting PC monitors from CES 2023
entries.description: Office-ready OLED, over-the-top sizes, and all the hertz? Yup, sounds like CES.
